definition: to right wrongs/to redress an injustice

sentences.english: A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows, is God in his holy habitation.
sentences.chinese: 神在他的圣所作孤儿的父，作寡妇的伸冤者。

sentences.english: The LORD executeth righteousness and judgment for all that are oppressed.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华施行公义，为一切受屈的人伸冤。

sentences.english: I know that the Lord secures justice for the poor and upholds the cause of the needy.
sentences.chinese: 我知道耶和华必为困苦人伸冤，必为穷乏人辨屈。

sentences.english: It is God that avengeth me, and that bringeth down the people under me.
sentences.chinese: 这位神就是那为我伸冤，使众民服在我以下的。

sentences.english: I know that the LORD will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.
sentences.chinese: 我知道耶和华必为困苦人伸冤，必为穷乏人辨屈。

sentences.english: It is God who sends punishment on my haters, and puts peoples under my rule.
sentences.chinese: 这位神，就是那为我伸冤，使众民服在我以下的。

sentences.english: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry.
sentences.chinese: 他为受屈的伸冤，赐食物与饥饿的。

sentences.english: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily”(Luke 18:6-7)
sentences.chinese: 我告诉你们，要快快的给他们伸冤了。

sentences.english: For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华要为他的百姓伸冤，为他的仆人后悔。

sentences.english: He upholds the …Oppressed and gives food to the hungry.
sentences.chinese: 他为受屈的伸冤，赐食物与饥饿的。

sentences.english: He executes justice for the fatherless and the widow, and loves the sojourner, giving him food and clothing.
sentences.chinese: 他为孤儿寡妇伸冤，又怜爱寄居的，赐给他衣食。

sentences.english: For the Lord will vindicate his people and have compassion on his servants.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华要为他的百姓伸冤，为他的仆人后悔。

sentences.english: It is God that avengeth me, and subdueth the people under me.
sentences.chinese: 这位神，就是那为我伸冤，使众民服在我以下的。

sentences.english: A father to the fatherless, a defender of widows, is God in his holy dwelling.
sentences.chinese: 神在他的圣所作孤儿的父，作寡妇的伸冤者。

sentences.english: Open your mouth, judge righteously; defend the rights of the poor and needy.
sentences.chinese: 你要开口说话，秉公审判，为困苦和穷乏的人伸冤。

sentences.english: It is God that avengeth me, and that bringeth down the people under me
sentences.chinese: 这位神就是那为我伸冤，使众民服在我以下的。

definition: to appeal for justice/to demand redress for a grievance
facts of an injustice/circumstances surrounding a miscarriage of justice
lit. to wash out a grievance/fig. to right a wrong/to redress an injustice
to exonerate/to clear (from an accusation)/to rehabilitate
to be wronged/to be subjected to an injustice
to reverse a verdict/to present different views on a historical person or verdict
to plea for leniency/to ask for a favor
to tell on sb/to complain (to a teacher, a superior etc)/to bring a lawsuit
